Ext.slider.Tip Example

Tags:

  • Ext JS
  • Ext JS 4.0.7
  • Ext.slider.Tip
  • slider
  • slidertip
  • useTips
[example]

See Also:

  • Ext.slider.Tip Documentation
© 2012 Sencha Inc. 
/*global Ext:false */
Ext.onReady(function () {
    Ext.create('Ext.slider.Single', {
        width: 214,
        minValue: 0,
        maxValue: 100,
        useTips: true,
        renderTo: Ext.getBody()
    });
});
